show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Obsolete Assumptions of Corporate Capitalism
content: A talk with Jerry Mander about his book, The Capitalism Papers: Fatal Flaws of an Obsolete System; why it’s time to... <!--more--> move on beyond  the foundational premises about pressure for endless material growth on a planet of finite resources; other fatal flaws of the system; our megashifts toward a new economics; poem by Robert Bly
